name: Finder
description:
A great puzzle for visual memory. Find and open two identical pictures, then they will disappear. It is necessary to find all the identical coincidences of pictures, the task is not simple, you can not open more than two pictures in a row. If you open different pictures, they will close. The pictures will be closed until you open two identical pictures.
Check yourself, improve your visual memory.

Features:
  • Pleasant graphics
  • Fast gameplay
  • 5 difficulty levels
